EmailTemplate.description: First email to confirm attendance at Senior College Tour
EmailTemplate.name: Senior College Tour RESPONSE
EmailTemplate.subject: Senior College Tour: Tuesday 21 August, 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
I confirm your booking for our Senior College Tour on Tuesday 21 August at 9.00am. You will receive a confirmation email closer to the date to remind you and provide further details.
If there's anything else I can help you with or if you have any questions at all, please feel free to contact me directly on 9286 9552.
Thanks and regards
Robyn
Robyn Pedley Enrolments Manager
St Andrew's Cathedral School
Sydney Square, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia
direct 9286 9552 mobile 0404 884 852 email RPedley@sacs.nsw.edu.au phone +61 2 9286 9500 fax +61 29286 9550
